entries.meaning: (parapsychology, science fiction) A person with telepathic ability, capable of reading the thoughts of others around them.

verbs.description: telepath (third-person singular simple present telepaths, present participle telepathing, simple past and past participle telepathed)

entries.meaning: (parapsychology, science fiction) To communicate by thought; to use telepathy.
examples: Thanos: "Did you not suspect I could tell you had been telepathing?"
